xml:
Testogel<tm tmtype="reg"/> Indications and dose

Hypogonadism due to androgen deficiency in men

By transdermal application

  • Adult

    Apply 50 mg once daily; increased in steps of 25 mg, adjusted according to response; maximum 100 mg per day.

Dose equivalence and conversion

One sachet of 5 g contains 50 mg of testosterone.

 Side-effects

Frequency not known

Allergic reactions; local irritation

Directions for administration

Apply thin layer of gel on clean, dry, healthy skin such as shoulders, arms or abdomen, immediately after sachet is opened. Not to be applied on genital area as high alcohol content may cause local irritation. Allow to dry for 3–5 minutes before dressing. Wash hands with soap and water after applying gel, avoid shower or bath for at least 6 hours.
Clinical medicinal product information Clinical medicinal product information
